Desc.entry: Provides a free citywide support service to help Sheffield smokers quit. Offers the following support: stop smoking groups that take place across the city; one-to-one support at over 100 GP practices, pharmacies and dentists, and at home for the housebound; a telephone support programme; free workplace groups in consultation with employers; specialist at-home midwife service for pregnant women and their families. An NHS service. Self or any referral.
